com.dor.coupons.system.facades

Class CustomerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dor.coupons.system.facades.CustomerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    @Scope(value="singleton")
 @Component
public class CustomerFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade

    This CustomerFacade is the functions Customer users will be able to use after successfull login to the system.

    This CustomerFacade implements CouponClientFacade.

    This CustomerFacade uses CustomerDBDAO, CouponDBDAO and TransactionDBDAO classes to read and write to the database.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dor aharon

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomerFacade

        public CustomerFacade()
        Default constractor for CustomerFacade.

    • Method Detail

      • purchaseCoupon

        public void purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)

        This purchaseCoupon allow customer users to purchase coupon from the database by CouponDBDAO and customerDBDAO.

        The action will be saved at the transaction table if successed and if not by TransactionDBDAO.

        Parameters:
        coupon - The coupon object that customer users want to purchase from the database.
        Throws:
        CouponAlreadyPurchasedException - When customer users will try to purchase a coupon that they already have.
        CouponExpierdException - When customer users will try to purchase an expired coupon. (endDate has passed)
        CouponOutOfStockException - When customer users will try to purchase an out of stock coupon. (amount = 0)

      • getPurchasedCouponByTitle

        public Coupon getPurchasedCouponByTitle(java.lang.String title)

        This getPurchasedCouponByTitle allow customer users to get their purchased coupon object by title from the database by CustomerDBDAO.

        Parameters:
        title - The title of the coupon the customer users want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Coupon object with the given title.

      • getAllPurchasedCoupons

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllPurchasedCoupons()

        This getAllPurchasedCoupons allow customer users to get all their purchased coupon object by title from the database by CustomerDBDAO.

        Returns:
        Collection of coupons objects that the customer purchase.

      • getPurchasedCouponsByType

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getPurchasedCouponsByType(CouponType couponType)

        This getPurchasedCouponsByType allow customer users to get their purchased coupons objects with a given coupon type from the database by CustomerDBDAO.

        Parameters:
        couponType - The couponType of the coupons the customer users want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Coupon object with the given title.

      • getPurchasedCouponsByPrice

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getPurchasedCouponsByPrice(double price)

        This getPurchasedCouponsByPrice allow customer users to get all their purchased coupons whose price is lower or equel to a given price from the database by CompanyDBDAO.

        Parameters:
        price - The maximum price (of the coupon) the customer users want to get.
        Returns:
        Collection of customer purchased coupons objects whose price is lower or equal to the given price.

      • login

        public CouponClientFacade login(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String password)

        login is for all clients who want to get in the CouponSystem will have to login to get premision to use the coupon system.

        This login is for customer users only

        Customer name and password are send to the customerDBDAO login function to try and login to the system.

        The action will be saved at the transaction table if successed and if not by TransactionDBDAO.

        Specified by:
        login in interface CouponClientFacade
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the client who wants to login to the system.
        password - Password of the client who wants to login to the system.
        Returns:
        CustomerFacade if login Succeed.
        Throws:
        WrongUserOrPasswordException - if login failed.
